Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory190.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'We met many other Demons underground. Interestingly, there seemed to be two types of Demons.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Simply speaking, some Demons were like animals. They only attacked out of instinct, and we were unable to communicate with them.'}
{3: 'And most enemies we met here belonged to this type.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Alright, I think I know what you had discussed with the King. He obviously is a bug!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As we moved together, Lucia also explained what they had encountered in the game.'}
{3: "What concerned me the most was still that King. He didn't feel like a game character at all.", 4: '(Look around)'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'He was manipulating the heroes using the game mechanics, and had a clear objective.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'And he looked like Hassen.', 3: '1001', 4: "Was he a bug caused by Celica's modifications?", 5: '1002'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Yeah, it feels really weird to see him. I thought Celica would use the other guy's face.", 5: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Hmm... I'm not too sure, but usually bugs are major problems that make the game unplayable. I don't think he is one of them.", 5: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "This game is so much hassle... Why don't we just quit?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "I know it's only a game... But I don't want to do things that may bring disasters to this world and the NPCs. And I don't want to give up either.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'NPC... They are just programs, but I still have a weird feeling when I see their human faces.', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Speaking of that, I remember the ending of a strange game I played before. In the end, the main character found out he was actually in a game, that he was being controlled all along.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Oh, the Butterfly Dream.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Huh? What was that? ...Are you saying you could also be the dreams of a butterfly?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I can't deny that. But if that's the case, I really want to know why that butterfly dreamed of things like the Punishing Virus.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Whether we are living in a dream or not doesn't matter. We just need to do our best.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Like, right now we should keep looking for Liv and meet up with her, so we can find out why she was separated from us.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Then we may be able to can find the key to reverse the situation.', 4: '1'}
